effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you would lose Winning Streak!, you have a chance to instead gain maximum stacks of Winning Streak! for 4s. These cannot be removed and have 50% additional effect while immune to removal.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: (2) Set: When your bleeds deal damage, they have a chance to grant you Vile Tincture for 8 sec, increasing your poison damage by 1.0% per stack (up to 5 stacks).
(4) Set: While you have 5 or more stacks of Vile Tincture, Garrote, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest deal 10% additional damage.

Set: When you would lose Winning Streak!, you have a chance to instead gain maximum stacks of Winning Streak! for 4s. These cannot be removed and have 50% additional effect while immune to removal.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Channel to vent flames for 2 sec, dealing 2.5 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies.

Mechanical enemies become Superheated, taking 119,718  additional Fire damage when struck by your next harmful ability. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 15,840 Agility for 15 sec.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
